mapper.name: BaseMapper
mapper.select: WITH CCT AS ( SELECT * FROM S_AIB.TBCHN3001H A WHERE 1=1 AND CUST_NO IS NOT NULL AND ORGN_DTM BETWEEN #{START} || '999999' AND #{END} || '999999' ) SELECT A.CUST_NO , A.ORGN_DTM , A.CHNL_ID , A.EVNT_ID , B.EVNT_NM FROM CCT A , S_AIB.TBCHN2002M B , S_AIB.TBCHN2004M C WHERE 1=1 AND A.CHNL_ID = C.CHNL_ID AND A.EVNT_ID = B.EVNT_ID AND C.EVNT_ID = B.EVNT_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT CUST_NO, EVNT_ID FROM TEST WHERE 1=1 AND ORGN_DTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{START}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{END}, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY CUST_NO ASC, ORGN_DTM ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST (CUST_NO, ORGN_DTM, EVNT_ID, EVNT_NM, SYS_EVNT_ID, SYS_EVNT_NM) VALUES (#{CUSTNO}, SYSDATE, #{EVNT_ID}, #{EVNT_NM}, #{SYS_EVNT_ID}, #{SYS_EVNT_NM} )
INSERT INTO TEST (CUST_NO, ORGN_DTM, EVNT_ID, EVNT_NM, SYS_EVNT_ID, SYS_EVNT_NM) VALUES (:1, :2, :3, :4, :5, :6)
